translation.Welcome: 'Greetings, join me on a trip to Latvian University'
translation.Aboutme: My name is Maris and I am a 3rd year student at LU, field of computer science I'll be giving you an insight into my daily life as a student, traveling from my dear home all the way to the best university in Latvia.
translation.Insight: Each day I travel around 80km to and from University at Rai≈Üa boulevard 19 whilst taking really green and scenic route in my car. I am grateful for this opportunity I've been handed. So what are you waiting for? Let's go, travel buddy!
